role_description: An Ansible role that installs Beets on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs Beets on nearly any platform. The purpose of beets is to get your music collection right once and for all. It catalogs your collection, automatically improving its metadata as it goes using the MusicBrainz database. Then it provides a bouquet of tools for manipulating and accessing your music.
